name: places/ChIJh3tl5lRYwokRrEaptNwi5D4
adrFormatAddress: 1501 Broadway #21, New York, NY 10036-5601, USA

originalText.text:
My inheritance was disregarded by Mr Howard Borkan and I never received news of the resolution of Joseph M Neira patrimony, my brother, related with shares of Joe Allen Restaurant in NYC.
Mr Borkan asked me for a power of attn document that from Spain, it was expensive and not easy and he completely ignored my 50% interest, in favor of my other brother.
I want Mr. Borkan to contact me and justified why he excluded me from my inheritance for being overseas.
I’m 71 years old and I should have been considered as an equal as John paul Neira.
I am Nicole Maris Neira
34-696 42 6608
Please I need what is legally mine!
Thank you

My inheritance was disregarded by Mr Howard Borkan and I never received news of the resolution of Joseph M Neira patrimony, my brother, related with shares of Joe Allen Restaurant in NYC.
Mr Borkan asked me for a power of attn document that from Spain, it was expensive and not easy and he completely ignored my 50% interest, in favor of my other brother.
I want Mr. Borkan to contact me and justified why he excluded me from my inheritance for being overseas.

originalText.text: Howard Borkan has been my family’s Attorney for over 15 years.  He has represented us on many matters, real estate, trust and estates, business affairs, and other private client matters.  Howard is professional, fair and represents the best interest of his clients. We will continue to work with Howard as legal counsel and adviser.
